Bio:

Travel addict, life sciences nerd and futurepreneur who's put down roots in the Hub and is ready to get her hands dirty in the startup scene. I got my start in online advertising, and am looking to work with people who are passionate about any of the following: healthcare, social media, (predictive) analytics and metrics, travel. Part time foodie, and full time problem-solver, I am ready to tackle marketing and/or product management with a disruptive product here in Boston.
